story: As a Visitor, I want to open the interactive map, so that I can see live road closures
As a Developer, I want to deploy the application, so that I can run integration tests
As a User, I want to export my contacts, so that I can send them marketing emails
As a Student, I want to upload my assignment, so that my professor can grade it online
As a User, I want to open the interactive map, so that I can see the location of landmarks
As a Customer, I want to reset my password, so that I can regain access to my account
As a Reader, I want to bookmark an article, so that I can find it later more easily
As a User, I want to filter search results, so that I can quickly focus on relevant items
